YakitRoute.yaklangProgramming: Program using the unique Yaklang, directly invoking the engine's core capabilities for POC types.
YakitRoute.dataProcessingDescription: Data can be processed in various ways (including encryption, decryption, deserialization, JSON handling, etc.), and custom data processing methods can also be defined via plugins.
YakitRoute.customPayload: Customize payloads through file uploads or manual edits, which can be used in brute force attacks and Web Fuzzer.
YakitRoute.subdomainAutoGenerate: Automatically generate a subdomain, and display all IPs that resolve from queries to this subdomain in a list.
YakitRoute.viewAndManageAllHistoricalTrafficFromMIT: View and Manage All Historical Traffic from MITM, Plugins, and Fuzzing
YakitRoute.mitmSslHijack: Install SSL/TLS certificates to intercept all browser traffic requests and response packets, providing both manual hijacking and passive scanning modes.
YakitRoute.fuzzBurpIntegration: By leveraging the core fuzzing tag syntax, seamless integration with Burp Suiteâ€™s Repeater and Intruder is achieved.
YakitRoute.fuzzPayLoadDeserialization: Configure serialized payloads or malicious classes to test deserialization, class loading, JNDI exploitation, and related vulnerabilities.
YakitRoute.detectICMPCallbackViaPingWithSpecificPac: Detect ICMP Callback via Ping with Specific Packet Size
YakitRoute.detectTCPCallbackViaRandomClosedPorts: Detect TCP Callback via Random Closed Ports
YakitRoute.vulnerabilityDetectionDescription: Conduct targeted vulnerability detection on specific targets using prebuilt vulnerability source code, with the ability to customize and add new types of POCs.
YakitRoute.bruteForceDescription: Perform brute force attacks on target login accounts and passwords, with unauthorized access detection conducted beforehand.
YakitRoute.reverseShellTool: Reverse shell receiver tool that can open a port on the server for listening and interaction.
YakitRoute.simultaneouslyProvideHTTP/RMI/HTTPSRever: Simultaneously Provide HTTP / RMI / HTTPS Reverse Connections on One Port
YakitRoute.viewAndManageReportsGeneratedDuringScann: View and Manage Reports Generated During Scanning
YakitRoute.auditRuleCodeAnalysis: Analyze code behavior by writing audit rules to identify risky code fragments; supports multiple languages such as Java, PHP, Yaklang, and Go (Golang).
YakitRoute.portScanDescription: Perform SYN and fingerprint detection on IPs, IP ranges, and domain ports. Plugins can be written to extend detection capabilities, meeting more personalized requirements.
YakitRoute.batchPOCScan: Freely select the required POCs to perform batch vulnerability detection.
YakitRoute.manageAllDetectedVulnerabilitiesAndRisks: Manage All Detected Vulnerabilities and Risks
YakitRoute.richRuleLibrary: Comes with a rich built-in rule library, allowing you to freely select rule groups for code scanning to help analyze code structure and identify risky code fragments.
YakitRoute.customAuditRules: You can customize audit rules and rule groups as needed, with support for import/export and cloud uploads for sharing, making it easy to build your own rule library.
